title: Only a Paper Moon
description: Mary Burke, a beautiful woman trapped in a loveless marriage, gets on with life in neutral Ireland until one day the war comes crashing down on her doorstep when a B17 bomber makes a forced landing in West Cork.Based on the actual landing of B17 bomber “T’Aint a Bird” during WWII, "Only a Paper Moon" is an enthralling story of unexpected love. “Who did he think he was, dropping out of a plane like that, with his fancy ways, singing to her about Paper Moons?”
author: Tina Pisco
